array.string: <b:t>5 miles is around the same distance as 8km. Fill in the gaps.</b:t>
<b:on number="5" suffix=" miles"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="8" suffix=" km"/>
<b:on number="25" suffix=" miles"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="40" suffix=" km"/>
<b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="20" suffix=" miles"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="32" suffix=" km"/>
